full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RDZOGS RIM GYI SDOMS TSIGS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,DE LTAR 'DUS PA'I RDZOGS RIM GYI, ,ZIN SDOMS MDOR BSDUS PA PAn CHEN MCHOG ,BSOD NAMS GRAGS DANG NAM MKHA' GRAGS, ,SOGS KYI GSUNG LAS SNE ZIN BKOD, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS 'DUS PA'I LAM, ,NAM YANG MI NUB DANG ZHING RGYAS, ,DE 'DZIN DPAL LDAN RGYUD GLA RNAMS, ,YAR NGO'I ZLA LTAR RGYS GYUR CIG ,MYUR DU RIN CHEN LTA BU YI, ,GDUL BYAR 'GYUR ZHING ZAB MO'I LAM, ,MTHAR PHYIN RDO RJE'I GNAS DE LA, ,MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO KUN 'GOD GYUR CIG ,DE LTAR RGYUD 'GREL DANG RDZOGS RIM @026B GYI SDOMS TSIGS 'DI GNYIS NI RANG GI SLOB MA RGYUD STOD GUNG RU DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^YONGS 'DZIN DGA' LDAN KHRI THOG BDUN BCU PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA YANG BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,` AOm SVA STI, ,BLA MA RDO RJE SEMS DPAR 'DUD, ,DPAL LDAN 'DUS PA'I RTZA RGYUD KYI, ,LE'U DANG POR TSUL BZHI BRGYAD, ,DRANG NGES BSHAD PA NYER DRUG DANG, ,DGONGS MAN DGONGS BSHAD RE LHAG MA, ,PHYUNG DANG BZHUGS RNAMS SGRA JI BZHIN, ,` GNYIS PAR TSUL BZHI DANG NGES RE, ,JI BZHIN GNYIS SO GZHAN DGONGS MIN, ,` LE'U GSUM PAR TSUL BZHI GCIG ,LHAG MA KUN LA DRANG NGES GSUNGS, ,` BZHI PAR DRANG NGES DGONGS MIN RE, ,JI BZHIN GNYIS SU RDZOGS PAR BSDUS, ,` LNGA PAR JI BZHIN SGRA BZHI DANG, ,DGONGS MIN GNYIS SO DRANG NGES GSUM, ,DGONGS BSHAD GCIG STE SDE TSAN BCU, ` LE'U DRUG PAR TSUL BZHI GCIG ,DGONGS BSHAD TSAN GNYIS DRANG NGES GSUM, ,` SNGAGS KYI SPYOD MCHOG LE'UR NI, ,JI BZHIN DGONGS MIN DGONGS BSHAD TSAN, ,GSUM GSUM TSUL BZHI DRANG NGES RE'O, ,` BRGYAD PAR DGONGS DANG DGONGS MIN RE, ,DRANG NGES GNYIS DANG JI BZHIN GSUM, ,` DGU BAR JI BZHIN DRANG NGES DGONGS BSHAD RE, ` SNYING PO BSKUL BAR DGONGS DGONGS MIN, ,JI BZHIN TSAN PA RE RES BSDUS, ,` RIG PA'I SKYES MCHOG LE'U LA, ,JI BZHIN DGONS BSHAD TSAN GNYIS GNYIS, ,DGONGS MIN DRANG NGES RE RER GSUNGS, ,` RGYUD 'DI'I LE'U BCU GNYIS PAR, ,DGONGS MIN GCIG DANG DRANG NGES GNYIS, ,DGONGS DANG JI BZHIN BZHI BZHI'O, ,` BCU GSUM PA @027A *, ,LA DRANG NGES GNYIS, ,DGONGS BZHI MIN GCIG JI BZHIN LNGA'O, ,` BCU BZHIR JI BZHIN DGONGS GNYIS GNYIS, ,` BCO LNGAR DGONGS MIN GCIG DGONGS GNYIS, ,LHAG MA RNAMS NI SGRA JI BZHIN, ,` BCU DRUG PA LA JI BZHIN DRUG ,JI BZHIN MIN GNYIS DGONGS PA BSHAD GNYIS, ,` BCU BDUN PA LA TSUL BZHI GCIG ,DGONGS MIN JI BZHIN GSUM GSUM MO, ,SHU BHAm, ,` AOm SVASTI, RGYUD DANG RDZOGS RIM BLTA BA'I LDE MIG 'DI, ,BDE GSAL BKA' BCU BLO BZANG TSE RING GIS, ,PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE TSOGS BDUD RTZI'I MTHUS, ,SRID BZHI'I RGUD PA DRUNG NAS 'BYIN PAR SHOG ,` STON PA MCHOG DES PHUN TSOGS 'KHOR DBUS SU, ,RGYUD 'DI BRI 'DZIN KLOG SEMS 'DRIR BCUG SOGS, ,BYANG CHUB RDO RJE 'DRA BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES, ,GSUNGS PA'I BDEN 'BRAS DENG 'DIR MNGON 'GYUR SHOG ,BDAG DANG 'GRO BA RNAM MKHA' MTHA' KHYAB KUN, ,^RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS BLA MAS MNYES BZHIN DU, ,RJES SU BZUNG NAS BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PA DANG, ,RIN CHEN LTA BU'I GDUL BYAR 'GYUR BAR SHOG ,(CES PA'I DGE BSNGO 'DI YANG KHRI THOG BDUN CU PAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
